summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Elevare NeuroVendas marketing editor app. All core features are working perfectly including templates, format changes, dark mode, Unsplash images, AI text generation, canvas editing, and export functionality.
passed_tests: Template loading and application (Promoção Impactante, Enquete Interativa)
Dark mode toggle with proper theme switching
Unsplash images panel with search functionality
Image search and selection (technology, business queries)
AI text generation with GPT-4o integration
AI prompt customization (Post Completo, tone: Profissional, platform: Instagram)
Elements panel with text and shape addition
Background color picker with gradient support
